# load_data { #bambi.load_data }

```python
load_data(dataset=None, data_home=None)
```

Load a dataset.

Run with no parameters to get a list of all available data sets.

The directory to save can also be set with the environment variable `BAMBI_HOME`.
The checksum of the dataset is checked against a hardcoded value to watch for data corruption.
Run `bmb.clear_data_home()` to clear the data directory.

<code>[**dataset**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`) or None]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [None]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Name of dataset to load.

<code>[**data_home**]{.parameter-name} [:]{.parameter-annotation-sep} [[str](`str`) or None]{.parameter-annotation} [ = ]{.parameter-default-sep} [None]{.parameter-default}</code>

:   Where to save remote datasets.
